title: Nigeria Boosts Gas Supply With OML 17 Output Surge
summary: The Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) and its partner, Heirs Energies, have successfully doubled natural gas production at a key oil block, OML 17, as part of a broader strategy to boost domestic supply and ease the country's electricity shortages. The increase comes from the OML 17 oil an…

title: Deutsche Börse launches €5.3bn bid for private equity-backed Allfunds
summary: German exchange group in exclusive discussions with Dutch-listed fund platform

title: North Sea oil and gas groups given go-ahead for new drilling
summary: Fields connected to existing rigs and pipelines will be explored following consultation on future of industry
